body:
Tim,

What you are running up against here is the resolution of sky patches for the Reinhart sky being finer than the hourly resolution of sun positions.  You can find a full account of this type of issue on this discussion:

[http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/cumulatives...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/cumulativeskymtx-error-1?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1163776&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987)

-Chris
